summary: This bill, the "Expanding Seniors Access to Mental Health Services Act," aims to improve access to mental health services for Medicare beneficiaries. It proposes two key changes: (1) excluding clinical social worker services from the skilled nursing facility prospective payment system and (2) expanding the types of clinical social worker services covered under Medicare to include services for health and behavior assessment and intervention. The amendments made by this section shall apply to items and services furnished on or after January 1, 2026.
